mapper.sql: id, user_id, name, description, cover_image, category_id, category, card_count, is_public, is_official, sort_order, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flashcard_deck (user_id, name, description, cover_image, category_id, category, card_count, is_public, is_official, sort_order, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{coverImage}, #{categoryId}, #{category}, #{cardCount}, #{isPublic}, #{isOfficial}, #{sortOrder}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM flashcard_deck WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY sort_order DESC, create_time DESC
SELECT FROM flashcard_deck WHERE (is_official = 1 OR user_id = 0) AND status = 1 ORDER BY sort_order DESC, create_time DESC
SELECT FROM flashcard_deck WHERE is_public = 1 AND status = 1 ORDER BY sort_order DESC, create_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM flashcard WHERE deck_id = #{deckId} AND status = 1
